reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks exactly like the picture and appreciate its soft material, comfortable fit, and perfect green color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Flattering & Perfect for Fall/Winter!
items.body: This sweater dress is absolutely gorgeous! The off-the-shoulder style gives it a chic, feminine touch while still being super comfortable. The knit fabric is soft, warm, and has just the right amount of stretch for a slim fit that’s flattering without feeling too tight. It’s the perfect length for pairing with boots or tights, and I love how versatile it is—I can dress it up with heels for a night out or keep it casual with sneakers for daytime wear. The quality feels great, and it definitely looks more expensive than it is. Perfect for fall and winter—I’ve already gotten compliments every time I’ve worn it. Highly recommend adding this to your wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Outdoors_WI

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, stylish, perfect for family photos!
items.body: Love the fit, it is flattering and very stylish. I also love the length, as it pairs perfectly with brown boots. The “off the shoulder” pose in the pic is a bit misleading. It does pull down off the shoulder but does not stay down the way the pic makes it look. You would have to constantly pull it down for it to look that way. I didn’t mind so much as it was for a family photo shoot so pulling it down wasn’t much of an issue. Read more
items.author: Amber Hooffstetter

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but stretches out simply by wearing it
items.body: This dress is very cute and the material feels like cashmere. The green color was spot on just as pictured. I felt like I was wrapped in a cute cozy warm blanket with style. The negatives were the material easily completely continued to stretch out while wearing and wear fitted should be around your waist just kept continuing to slip and fall down because the material stretches out on its own. It also does not fall off the shoulder as shown you would really have to size up to create that look, but if you did that you would not have the fitted look either. Definitely needed a belt, but even with a belt on it kept sliding down under the belt. I am about 155 and 5’5” and I got a size medium. If I ordered again, I’d probably size down just to make up for the stretching out, but I’m still not sure the material would hold the look for more than an hour because it stretches out.. Read more
items.author: Just-can't-stop-shopping

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and sexy!
items.body: Love this dress! It is so cute and comfy but still allows for some sex appeal without being vulgar. It’s super soft and feels like a comfy sweater! Read more
items.author: Twin Mom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater dress
items.body: Cute sweater dress. Perfect for date night paired with brown knee high boots and matching brown clutch. My husband loved it and thought it was so sexy for a fall/winter dress. It's a dress but the skirt (bottom) part of the dress pulled down and I kept having to pull it up to get the top to hang over the waist band for that two-piece look. Overall a great dress for a fall/winter date night. Read more
items.author: Em McBride

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the holidays!
items.body: Great quality for the price point. This off the shoulder sweater dress is the perfect thickness and doesn’t make me overheat. The material is super soft and the color was just as beautiful in person. I am 5’6 155 pounds and the large fit perfect. Read more
items.author: itsivana93

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper, thin fabric
items.body: Cheap, thin fabric. Not made well and too tight. Read more
items.author: CAC

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater dress
items.body: Cute dress but totally see through. I needed it in white so maybe some of the other colors are better Read more
items.author: Nathalie Clift

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Burgundy, Z1-red, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Green, Z1-pink, Z1-white, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
